title: How to use Emotes properly in game?
body: Am I the only one spamming when you happen to use one lol? I can't figure out if you drag and let go on the emote wheel or click it with a certain left or right button? :/ Sometimes things work and I do them again and they don't. But I am tired, very tired... Lol please someone explain for me please :D

replies.body:
Emotes work the same way as the ping wheel, press the button that you have bound it to, drag your mouse in the direction _(up, down, left, right)_ of the emote you want, then release the button _(the mouse does not have to be floating over the emote, it just has to have travelled in the right direction)_.

Or you can press the button and let go immediately for your centre emote.

I would never pay for emotes, I only have the 3 I got for free, but I find the emote wheel very easy to use.

T, drag direction with mouse, release.
Rocket surgery.
